ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1557â€“ Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1557 - FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to 1) allow the specified use of the following additives: citric acid, ascorbic acid, calcium chloride and calcium disodium ethylenediaminetetraacetate and 2) correct inconsistencies between the English and the French versions and spelling errors.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0043 Publication Date: 2012-03-28
